content:
© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
Sensitivity: Internal
Inbound Sales Function Analysis
1
Analyzed the effectiveness of the inbound sales function for the client across 
different channel such as Campaigns, Forms, Chats, etc. and understand 
performance of sales funnel from Calls made to sales won. 
Telecom Company

© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
Sensitivity: Internal
Picture this…
You’re looking to improve your top-line revenue by finding opportunities to enhance inbound sales, but you don’t have 
visibility into the sales funnel and agent performance for your distributed teams
Telecom company needs visibility to “connect” leads to sales
2
Your value is enhanced. 
You have optimized and streamlined sales funnel consolidation and reporting processes on Tableau improving the execution 
efficiency by 66% compared to previous processes, enabling near real-time tracking and benchmarking of agent performance, 
campaign effectiveness, and operational performance for inbound sales team. You can analyze the sales funnel data and identify 
an opportunity to increase sales conversion by ~11% per month by optimizing lead campaign and agent performance.
Inbound Sales Analysis
KEY RESULT   
•
~66% improvement in 
reporting efficiency
•
Opportunity to 
increase sales 
conversion by ~11% per 
month
VALUE LEVERS PULLED
•
Performance tracking
•
BI Reporting
•
Campaign Optimization
2
You turn to Accordion. 
We partner with your team to consolidate inbounds leads from multiple channels & campaigns to analyze & benchmark 
sales performance and find opportunities to improve campaign and team performance, including
1) Analyzing various source of inbound leads and building a consolidates sales funnel from MQL to SQL to Won sales
2) Benchmarking the campaign performance for each of the lead source to understand the its effectiveness and 
opportunity to improve the top-line sales funnel
3) Understanding the sales agent performance from a 360-degree view to analyze key focus areas such as calls made, talk 
time, conversion to help agents reach their true potential.
4) Automating the tableau-based reporting on set hourly cadence to have both tactical and strategic visibility into the 
sales channel and act in a time efficient manner.

© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
Sensitivity: Internal
3
Inbound Calls: Trend of KPIs Across The Sales Funnel
ILLUSTRATIVE
Weekly Trend of IB Calls, SQL 
and Won Sales giving an 
overall performance indicator
Conversion rates (%) by 
Disposition groups giving a 
further drill down on Calls status

© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
Sensitivity: Internal
4
Inbound Leads: By Forms As a Lead Source
ILLUSTRATIVE
Leads generated through Forms 
and the corresponding monthly SQL 
and Sales
Drill down at UTM Medium/ 
UTM Source level

© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
Sensitivity: Internal
5
Inbound Calls: By Campaign Lead Source and Sub-Source
ILLUSTRATIVE
Weekly Trend of IB Calls, SQL 
and Won Sales giving an 
overall performance indicator
Conversion rates (%) by Call Type 
giving the status of the IB calls on 
a weekly basis
Drill down at the Sources and 
Sub Sources level

© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
Sensitivity: Internal
6
Inbound Calls: Agent Performance
ILLUSTRATIVE
Breakdown of total hours 
clocked in on an hourly basis
Hours clocked in by each Agent 
to make the calls

© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
Sensitivity: Internal
7
Inbound Calls: Agent Performance Deep-Dive
ILLUSTRATIVE
Agent-wise conversion ratio 
giving a measure of the overall 
efficiency
